subject: Re: New Meaning of "Seven" for those who get that message
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
Bill,

I agree with that, the fact that i get that # every session is just 
another thing that fascinates me about this research.  I have yet to 
get a direct response on the meaning, maybe they are not ready to say 
what it is just yet.  I just randomly search for the meaning of the 
number 7 and see if anything makes sense, while i wait for them to 
tell me what is their meaning behind it.

-Steve H.


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "psi_research" <vilhellm@...> wrote:
>
> Steve,
> 
> Thanks for posting this as it gives more food for thought on Seven.
> It's been astounding how it seems to have been consistent for so 
many
> to be getting that number. It's still a mystery as there is little
> besides that number that has been spoken so it's been out of 
context.
> -Bill
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "LC Duplatt" <lcdupla@> wrote:
> >
> > Steve:
> > 
> > Nice spiritual interpretation of the number. ;)
> > 
> > LC
> > 
> > --- In EVP-ITC@...m, "Steve Hultay" <urkel23@> wrote:
> > >
> > > 
> > >  7.      Seven represents the enlightened person, full special 
> > > orientation, awareness of 
> > > manifestation. Seven represents perfect groupings, fullness of 
> > > planetary and angelic 
> > > orders. Seven symbolizes perfection of order, energies and 
> > spiritual 
> > > principals. Seven 
> > > represents eternal life and the perfection of a complete cycle. 
It 
> > > symbolizes a fresh start 
> > > after a cycle has been completed and positive regeneration. 
Seven 
> > is 
> > > the fullness of 
> > > space and time and the fullness of the universe in motions. 
Through 
> > > its hidden 
> > > properties, the number seven maintained all things in being, 
> > mundane 
> > > and spiritual, and 
> > > bestowed life. Seven is the number of crowning achievement.
> > > 
> > > A modern interpretation of the number seven affirms that you 
are on 
> > > the right spiritual 
> > > path and that what you are working on creating is very close to 
> > > coming into being.
> > > 
> > > __________________________
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > This seems to make the most sense to me so far about the #7 
some of 
> > > us have been getting.
> > > 
> > > -Steve H.
> > >
> >
>
